sentences.sContent: He was very skilled at pointing down the blocks of granite.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was very skilled at pointing down the blocks of granite.
sentences.sCn: 他善于把花岗岩石凿平。

sentences.sContent: If you're working in steel or granite, redesigning or adding onto something is very expensive.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you're working in steel or granite, redesigning or adding onto something is very expensive.
sentences.sCn: 如果你用钢或花岗岩来工作，重新设计或增加一些东西是很贵的。

sentences.sContent: Because water is the softest substance in the world, but yet it can  penetrate the hardest rock or anything --  granite, you name it.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because water is the softest substance in the world, but yet it can penetrate the hardest rock or anything -- granite, you name it.
sentences.sCn: 因为水是世界上最柔软的物质，但是它却可以穿透最坚硬的岩石，或者说花岗岩等石材。

words.tran: 花岗石的；由花岗岩形成的
